title: Beautiful upgrades! Fully renovated 1043 sq ft 2 bed / 2 bath!
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Brooks Crossing Apartments!', 'Located at:', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1043 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1500/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within walking distance to public transportation , but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical and numerous restaurants .', 'Community Features:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Gated', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Playground', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Sparkling Pool', '◾ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '◾ Covered Parking', '◾ Fax/Copy Services', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Monthly Resident Events', '◾ Multi Use Room', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Package Service', '◾ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '◾ Sports Courts', '◾ Tennis Court', 'Unit Features:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Deck', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Fireplace', '◾ Freezer', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Range', '◾ Refrigerator', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Wi-Fi', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D6C0C42A524340']
